div.head: 唇生核
div.div: a kernel developing on the lips

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: a kernel developing on the lips

sense.def: Abbreviated Designation chun he 唇核 , lip kernel. Pathological Condition with a small swelling resembling a fruit pit growing on one’s lip. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 6: 治唇生核方，豬屎平量一升，以水投，絞取汁，温服之 , “Recipe to cure a kernel developing on the lips : 1 sheng of hog feces is to be stirred with water. Strain the liquid and ingest it warm”.
